settings.question: Is traditional Chinese medicine an effective alternative to western medicine?
settings.answer_body1: Traditional Chinese medicine (TCM) supplements are just as effective compared to alternative western medicine. Plenty of scientific and clinical trials have proven TCM to be effective for many people. TCM is an ancient Chinese medicine dating back 1000 years ago. Well Well Well is your trusted Chinese medicine shop online and in-store.

settings.question: What health conditions can Chinese medicine help treat?
settings.answer_body1: Traditional Chinese medicine can help all types of issues regarding the body including fertility, hormone issues, sleep and digestion. Its holistic approach to regain balance, looks to achieve balance between the internal body organs and the external elements of earth, fire, water, wood, and metal. There are many formulations of herbs in capsule form. Buying Chinese medicine online has never been easier.

settings.question: What are the benefits of Chinese herbs?
settings.answer_body1: The benefits of Chinese herbs include relief from internal as well as emotional and mental health problems. These traditional herbal blends have been used for centuries to combat diseases, boost the health of your organs, body and skin, treat pain and alleviate symptoms related. If you're searching for traditional Chinese medicine in Canada or a 'Chinese herbal store near me', you've come to the right place.

settings.question: What are some commonly used Chinese medicinal herbs?
settings.answer_body1: Commonly used Chinese medicinal herbs include astragalus, dong quai, ginger, kudzu, and schizandra. It is believed that these Chinese herbal treatments help restore the balance of the vital energy in your body (Qi).
settings.answer_body2: Buying Chinese medicinal herbs online in Canada is becoming increasingly popular because plenty of evidence-based studies have shown them not just to be safe, but also highly effective for many people. Well Well Well is your Chinese herbal store online.

settings.question: Do Chinese herbal supplements cause side effects?
settings.answer_body1: Chinese herbal supplements do not have side effects when used correctly. Always consult with your health care practitioner if you are using medication as there can be counter interactions with traditional Chinese medicine. Our online store carries the most common and popular traditional Chinese herbal medicine you can buy online.

settings.question: What is traditional Chinese medicine?
settings.answer_body1: Traditional Chinese medicine has evolved over thousands of years based on the belief that restoring the vital energy in your body and balance of yin and yang can improve your emotional, physical and mental well-being. Such medicines usually contain plant extracts, animal parts and minerals.

settings.question: Why do Chinese believe in traditional medicine?
settings.answer_body1: Many people believe that traditional remedies and herbs from China can restore the balance of energy in your body to improve your mental and physical health. Of course, there are critics that argue otherwise, but a number of trials have shown that many traditional Chinese medicines are highly effective for many people.

settings.question: Do Chinese herbal supplements cause side effects?
settings.answer_body1: Most experts and practitioners agree that herbal supplements and traditional Chinese medicines and supplements are perfectly safe to consume, though we recommend discussing your health issues with a medical professional before you use any medicines. If you are concerned with herbal supplement side effects, you should only use medicines approved by Health Canada and other regulatory bodies that require rigorous testing.
